Russia summons Swiss ambassador over Russian asset confiscation plansRussia's foreign ministry said it had summoned Swiss ambassador Krystyna Marty Lang on Tuesday over a decision by Switzerland's parliament to work out a legal basis for the confiscation of Russian state assets. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 11:12:32 GMT YZOTTHKQSZP7BH4SIPMATFHZVY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-summons-swiss-ambassador-over- Russian-asset-confiscation-plans-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
As Argentina food prices soar, more people scavenge to surviveSandra Boluch, a fruit and vegetable seller in Buenos Aires, is seeing a worrying trend as inflation soars over 250%: sliding sales and more people scavenging for what she throws away, hoping to find enough for a meal. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 11:05:45 GMT B5XTYLUBI5MQTBH3ADTH3IIVRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-food-prices-soar-more-people-scavenge-survive-2024-03-12/Miguel Lo Bianco市场宏观问题
Exclusive: Peace deal with Colombia unlikely before end of Petro's term-EMC rebel leaderIt will be difficult for the Estado Mayor Central (EMC) armed group to sign a peace deal with the Colombian government before President Gustavo Petro finishes his term in 2026, despite trust between the two sides, a major leader of the EMC told Reuters on the sidelines of peace talks. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 11:03:33 GMT L2BOGHW4ABIWHDM5SI2X7S6UFM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peace-deal-with-colombia-unlikely-before-end-petros-term-emc-rebel-leader-2024-03-12/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
India-made fighter jet Tejas crashes for first time; pilot ejected safelyA domestically made fighter aircraft of the Indian Air Force crashed on Tuesday in the western state of Rajasthan, the first such incident since the jet was inducted nearly eight years ago. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 11:00:50 GMT RSXF6WU7HZN6NBRRNZLVULP45Y https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-made-fighter-jet-tejas-crashes-first-time-pilot-ejected-safely-2024-03-12/Reuters世界印度
German shipowners want clarity from Berlin on carbon tradingGerman shipowners' group VDR on Tuesday urged the Berlin government to provide legislation implementing European Union requirements to include the sector in the bloc's carbon trading system. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:49:16 GMT 56CZXZIOUNLHRHKAQPHCAYYIPQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/german-shipowners-want-clarity-berlin-carbon-trading-2024-03-12/Reuters可持续发展

Switzerland to try Assad's uncle for crimes against humanitySwitzerland's Attorney General's Office said on Tuesday that it would put on trial Rifaat al-Assad, an uncle of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, for war crimes and crimes against humanity dating back to his time as a military commander in 1982. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:48:06 GMT 6IPYC5YVKZJJRAGSTGACNR73BA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/switzerland-try-assads-uncle-crimes-against- humanity-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian military cargo plane crashes with 15 people on boardRussia said one of its Ilyushin Il-76 military cargo planes crashed shortly after takeoff on Tuesday with 15 people on board due to a fire in one of its engines. EU to mull measures against Iran over possible missile transfers to Russia - draftEuropean Union leaders are ready to respond with new and significant measures against Iran amid reports that Tehran may transfer ballistic missiles to Russia for use against Ukraine, draft conclusions of a summit to be held next week said. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:14:15 GMT LUKTAZUQJLFLKJJ4EN7CVYLOQ https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-mull-measures-against-iran-over-possible-missile-transfers-Russia-draft-2024-03-12/Reuters世界
Biden, Trump poised to clinch nominations and set up bruising presidential rematchPresident Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump are poised to win enough delegates on Tuesday to clinch their respective parties' nominations, formally kicking off the first U.S. presidential election rematch in nearly 70 years. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:02:21 GMT BQEWBMOXUBKRNE6D2DJM7UF7XU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-trump-poished-clinch-nominations-set-up-bruising-presidential-rematch-2024-03-12/Joseph Ax世界美国
EU countries to demand bloc does more to help farmers, draft statement saysEuropean Union country leaders will urge the EU to work quickly on more measures to support farmers in response to months of protests by angry agriculture workers, draft conclusions for an EU leaders' summit showed. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 09:45:32 GMT X3VZ2ZSU6FJWLCS42JSSBLJ2II https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-countries-demand-bloc-does-more-help-farmers-draft-statement-says-2024-03-12/Jan Strupczewski, Kate Abnett世界欧洲
